WorkItem.Description:
I have a update for flash 18.0.x.x. this was released and is installed on the computers. Wpp shows installed in the status. Now if I change the update to "approve for uninstall", it does uninstall the update, but it either shows as "installed" or "not installed." Shouldn't the status change to " uninstalled" so you can determine what pcs the update was uninstalled on.

Overall, I have a flash 18 and flash 19 update. Both are installed. Now I need Wpp to remove flash 18 and report that they have been removed. 

Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Approved for Uninstall shows not installed

Comments.Message:
Installation status is evaluated by client itself using "IsInstallated", "IsInstallable" and "IsSupperseded" rules.
Additionally, if the update is made of a MSI or MSP file, this file have it's own set of rules.
Revise the update a take a look to these rules, evaluate it against computer's settings, and you will have your answer
